markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vishkanya Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4025) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 61</row>

</column>

---

You favor weapons historically used in subtle work and in ceremony. You gain access to and are trained with the [blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66), [fighting fan](/Weapons.aspx?ID=93), [kris](/Weapons.aspx?ID=264), [kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56), and [shuriken](/Weapons.aspx?ID=79). In addition, you gain access to all uncommon [vishkanyan](/Traits.aspx?ID=369) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial vishkanyan weapons are simple weapons and advanced vishkanyan weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Vishkanya Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Vishkanya Weapon Arts](/Feats.aspx?ID=4028), [Vishkanya Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=4035)
name: Vishkanya Weapon Familiarity
